fields.name: Name
fields.title: Title
fields.sendAccessInfo: Send Email with Access Info to User

tooltips.defaultTeam: All records created by this user will be related to this team by default.
tooltips.userName: Letters a-z, numbers 0-9, dots, hyphens, @-signs and underscores are allowed.
tooltips.isActive: If unchecked then user won't be able to login.
tooltips.teams: Teams which this user belongs to. Access control level is inherited from team's roles.
tooltips.roles: Additional access roles. Use it if user doesn't belong to any team or you need to extend access control level exclusively for this user.
tooltips.portalRoles: Additional portal roles. Use it to extend access control level exclusively for this user.
tooltips.portals: Portals which this user has access to.

messages.passwordWillBeSent: Password will be sent to user's email address.
messages.accountInfoEmailSubject: Simply I Do User Access Info
messages.passwordChangeLinkEmailBody: You can change your password by following this link {link}. This unique URL will be expired soon.
messages.emailAddressCantBeEmpty: Email Address can not be empty
messages.uniqueLinkHasBeenSent: The unique URL has been sent to the specified email address.
messages.setupSmtpBefore: You need to setup SMTP settings to make the system be able to send password in email.
messages.firstNameCantBeEmpty: First Name can not be empty
messages.lastNameCantBeEmpty: Last Name can not be empty
messages.brandNameCantBeEmpty: Brand Name can not be empty
messages.serviceTypeCantBeEmpty: Service Type can not be empty
messages.packageTypeCantBeEmpty: Package Type can not be empty
messages.paymentAddressCantBeEmpty: Payment Address can not be empty
messages.validFirstName: First and/or Last name should contain alphabets
messages.confirmPasssordCantBeEmpty: Confirm Password can not be empty
messages.passwordEqualConfirmPasssordCantBeEmpty: Password and Confirm Password should be equal
